alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 7:50AM EST until December 19 at 8:22AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rondout Creek at Rosendale. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 21.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Rondout Creek Rosendale Flood Stage: 18.0 Observed Stage at Mon 7 am: 15.5 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 21.5 Mon 7 pm 19.8 Tue 1 am 18.5 Tue 7 am 16.3 Tue 1 pm 15.5 Tue 7 pm 14.9 Wed 1 am 14.3 Wed 7 am 13.6 &&
